name: SG's Movie Fractures Quiz | Movies Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
halloween.

	Michael Myers goes on the rampage for the very first time and Donald Pleasence is the man who has to stop him.

the mask.

	Starring Jim Carrey, 'The Mask' centers around Stanley Ipkiss, a quiet mannered bank clerk who finds a mysterious mask and his life is transformed.

goldeneye & golden eye.

	Pierce Brosnan's first outing as James Bond, released in 1995 and directed by Martin Campbell. Other famous names that appeared in the movie include Judi Dench, Famke Janssen and Sean Bean.

the replacements.

	Keanu Reeves plays Shane Falco, a former college player who has the chance to shine again. Gene Hackman and Rhys Ifans also star.

raging bull.

	A Martin Scorsese masterpiece. Filmed in black and white, 'Raging Bull' is a  biography starring Robert De Niro as Jake LaMotta supported by Joe Pesci. Part controversial, part explosive. Just brilliant.

code of silence.

	Chuck Norris plays a Chicago cop in one of the best movies he has made. Action all the way.

entrapment.

	Starring Sean Connery and Catherine Zeta-Jones as two thieves, 'Entrapment' is a movie with so many twists that by the end, you don't know which way to turn.

next of kin.

	An all-star cast including Patrick Swayze, Liam Neeson, Adam Baldwin & Helen Hunt, 'Next of Kin' is an underrated movie about a war between the mob and a Chicago cop. Then relatively unknown, Ben Stiller also appears.

exit wounds.

	Another fine Steven Seagal action flick, starring as Orin Boyd, a tough cop with a bad reputation, who is transferred to a bad precinct with a tough reputation.

risky business.

	'Risky Business' starred a then-21 year old Tom Cruise as Joel, a rebellious teenager who wants to have fun while his parents are away.
